name: pdf-qa-training
description: Train a small model for PDF Q&A that runs in the browser

scripts.setup: python -m venv venv && call venv\Scripts\activate.bat && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.setup-unix: python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.serve-dev: cd web-interface && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.build-web: cd web-interface && npm install && npm run build
